description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans has a requirement for the purchase of one (1) Multi-mode (fluorescence and absorbance) plate reader system for enzyme kinetic and absorbance spectra
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Information

* **Title:** Plate Reader
* **Reference Number:** WS4461953427-Doc4531109212
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4461953427
* **Publication Date:** April 29, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 14, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **End User Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A

### Tender Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans has a requirement for the purchase of one (1) multi-mode plate reader system, which includes all required hardware, software, installation, and documentation. The system will be used for enzyme kinetic and absorbance spectra measurements.

### Evaluation Criteria

* **Evaluation Method:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

* **Region(s) of Opportunity:** None

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None

### Reference Documents

* **Solicitation Documents:** Available on the provided link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19548495?extsite=MTk1NDg0OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
